divs: Sighting DetailsAT 10:30 pm I was sitting on my balcony, smoking a cigarette. Just happened to look up and noticed a boomerang shaped object heading south. There were no lights and no sound coming from it. It did reflect light though which was why I noticed it. At first I thought it was a stealth jet, then realized that it was too wide and not shaped quite right for that. I lost sight of it as it went over the top of the house. I just went in, jotted it all down in my journal and went to bed. Didn't report it soner because I don't want to be considered one of the looney people.
Summary: lookd up and noticed a boomerang shaped object, no lights, no sound
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around October 2nd 2005
